attributes.action: Save the Ark being Injured by National Trust @ Stonehenge, 1.2m below Heel Stone
attributes.additional_details: This Petition to "Save the Ark being Injured by National Trust" (SAINT) is for UK Government and Parliament to cause, or to force as the case may be, National Trust to exhume the Auger Cored brass Altar of Burnt Offering containing such historic Relics from its shallow depth of 1.2m (4ft) below Heel Stone base. Or to cause, or to force as the case may be, retraction of National Trust's claim(s) in being an historic conservation organisation. For more background link to WHS & UNESCO, or ICOMOS UK
attributes.background: Mishkan is located 1.2m (4ft) below Heelstone. The seven Spirits of God are cemented in Pozzolanic concrete inside eastern Scroll Trench and are capped by Hele Stone, a 35 ton Sarsen rock. Ancient concrete of Ezekiel and Daniel, once protecting them, has weathered, and is now crumbling (Auger Cores)

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
